qualityCell.definition: The number of barcodes associated with at least one cell
qualityCell.notes: Higher or lower than expected values may indicate inaccurate cell count, cell lysis, or failures during GEM generation.

qualityCell.definition: The total number of sequenced reads divided by the number of barcodes associated with cell-containing partitions
qualityCell.notes: The necessary sequencing depth per cell depends on the cell type (high or low RNA) and the desired analysis.
